instruction: Construct a story using the details as hints.
input:
Location: New York City 
Time: Spring 
Tone: Nostalgia
output: The sun was shining brightly as I walked around New York City in the spring. I had been living in the city for over a year now, and although I had grown to love the hustle and bustle of the city, I couldn't help but feel a little nostalgic for the slower, calmer pace of my hometown. Everywhere I looked I saw reminders of my past, giving me a bittersweet feeling of memories and possibilities.
